snippet: A woman who unsuccessfully tried to intervene in Tom Brady's legal case against the NFL over the "Deflategate" scandal is asking the court to reconsider his four-game suspension....
lead_paragraph: A woman who unsuccessfully tried to intervene in Tom Brady's legal case against the NFL over the "Deflategate" scandal is asking the court to reconsider his four-game suspension.

headline.main: Third Party Tries to Intervene in Brady 'Deflategate' Case
headline.print_headline: Third Party Tries to Intervene in Brady 'Deflategate' Case
